forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 22C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 71F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 22C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 71F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 22C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 72F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 68F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
